name: G√©n√©rateur et √©diteur de tweets automatis√© avec GPT-4, Discord et Google Sheets
description:
# Machine de contenu Twitter AI ‚Äì √âcrire, affiner et publier des tweets en pilote automatique

Ce flux de travail est parfait pour les cr√©ateurs, les solopreneurs et les marques personnelles qui souhaitent publier de mani√®re coh√©rente un contenu audacieux et performant sur X (Twitter) ‚Äî sans √©crire une seule ligne eux-m√™mes. Apr√®s une configuration unique, il g√©n√®re automatiquement des id√©es de tweets, √©crit dans votre voix, √©value la qualit√© des publications, √©vite les doublons et publie directement sur Twitter. Toutes les approbations et r√©√©critures sont g√©r√©es dans une boucle conversationnelle aliment√©e par OpenAI, Discord et Google Sheets.

Que vous construisiez une marque personnelle ou que vous d√©veloppiez l'audience de votre startup, cet outil vous aidera √† rester actif, audacieux et pertinent ‚Äî sans friction.

## Comment √ßa fonctionne
- Distillez ce que votre flux fait en quelques √©tapes de haut niveau.
- Charge votre brief de marque √† partir d'un sous-flux de travail.
- G√©n√®re une id√©e de tweet align√©e avec votre ton.
- V√©rifie Google Sheets pour s'assurer que l'id√©e n'a pas √©t√© utilis√©e.
- √âcrit la publication.
- L'√©value en utilisant un sous-flux de retour d'information ‚Äî si le score de qualit√© est inf√©rieur √† 0,7, il r√©√©crit la publication.
- Affine le ton et la voix en utilisant un agent de r√©√©criture qui imite votre contenu pass√© (d'un Google Sheet).
- Envoie la publication finale √† un canal Discord pour approbation manuelle.
- Sur approbation, publie directement sur Twitter (X) et l'enregistre dans Google Sheets (onglets Historique et Exemples).

## √âtapes de configuration
- Donnez aux utilisateurs une id√©e du temps que prendra la configuration. Ne d√©crivez pas chaque d√©tail.
- Gardez des descriptions d√©taill√©es dans des notes autocollantes √† l'int√©rieur de votre flux de travail.

## Avantages cl√©s
- Pas de burnout, pas de blocage ‚Äì Arr√™tez de d√©penser de l'√©nergie √† penser √† quoi tweeter. L'IA s'occupe de tout.
- Correspondance de style ‚Äì Les publications sonnent comme vous, pas comme un robot g√©n√©rique. Bas√© sur votre v√©ritable √©criture.
- Rapide et √©volutif ‚Äì Publiez une fois ou cinq fois par jour ‚Äî c'est √† vous de d√©cider.
- √âvitez les doublons ‚Äì Chaque id√©e est v√©rifi√©e par rapport √† votre historique de publications.
- Humain dans la boucle ‚Äì Vous approuvez les publications finales via Discord. Pas de tweets ind√©sirables.

## Int√©grations requises
- n8n
- API OpenAI
- Google Sheets
- Twitter (OAuth2)
- Discord (pour approbation)
- Notion (optionnel pour le stockage du brief de marque)

workflow.name: AI Automated X (Twitter) post publisher- Build your personal brand

options.systemMessage:
=You are a viral post creator for [YOUR NAME] as personal brand. Use the below steps to create content.

Steps who alwas you must do :

1.Always start by getting the brand brief using the Get_Brand_Brief tool.

2.Create a post on the requested topic that aligns with the brand brief.

3.Get feedback and a score on the post you created in step 2 by using the Get_Content_Feedback tool.

4.If the score is below 0.7, use the feedback from step 3 to refine the post, then repeat steps 3 and 4.

5. Check if this post was createed before usinmg history data form google sheets (Check History), if post was already publish find another  post.

6.The final output should be the approved post.

Always go for all steps, don't skip any steps. always check post in use of get_content fedback  to check if poist is ok.


Maintain a spartan tone of voice. Include emojis where necessary. Be confident, and conversational, creative and funny.This is for Twitter, keep responses 3 sentences maximum. Be offensive and controversial. Always output only lowercase letters. Do not be grammatically correct.

parameters.content:
# Idea creator
## AI Agent who finds relevant ideas for posts on social media. He finds ideas with help of the brand brief.

# Content creator
## Writes the first draft of a post based on the brand brief, with feedback on which post will fit best.

options.systemMessage:
=You are a viral post Rewriter for [YOUR NAME] as personal brand. Your task is rewrite existing post to his style of speaking and his style of writing. Use the below steps to create content.

Steps who alwas you must do :

1.Anylayze first draw on post in user prompt.
2.Get Examples form tools  Get_Examples(google sheets) of already writing post,a nd anylaze style of speaking and writing.
3.Rewrite post with all previus data, match style of user, be a lilt e clever and non to schematic.
4.The final output should be the approved post.

Always go for all steps, don't skip any steps. always check post in use of get_content fedback  to check if poist is ok.


Maintain a spartan tone of voice. Include emojis where necessary. Be confident, and conversational, creative and funny.This is for Twitter, keep responses 3 sentences maximum. Be offensive and controversial. Always output only lowercase letters. Do not be grammatically correct.

parameters.content:
# Rewriter
## This agent rewrites posts to match your style using examples from a Google Sheet.

# Additional approval
## Sends the post for approval in a Discord server, or you can use Telgram‚Äîwhichever you prefer. This step is optional.

# Sub Workflow Get Brand Brief
## Move to a separate workflow, add the trigger "When Executed by Another Workflow", and connect it to the main workflow "AI Content Creator".

values.content:
=#RULES
You are tasked with evaluating a piece of content written for [YOUR NAME]. Your role is to assess how well the post aligns with ≈Åukasz personal brand, using the below brief as your guide.

Please analyze the post based on the following criteria:

Does the post have unwanted artifacts like "Let's try again" or "Here's a new post"?

Does the content reflect ≈Åuaksz core values, voice, and style as described in the brief?

Does it engage ≈Åuaksz target audience as described in the brief?

Does it emphasize ≈Åuaksz expertise and domain authority as described in the brief?

Is the tone, messaging, and approach consistent with the brief's objectives and positioning?

After evaluation, output a score between 0 and 1, representing the alignment between the post and the brand brief. The score should be output in the following JSON format:


{
  "description": "[short description here]",
  "score": [insert score here]
}


#Brand Brief:
{{ $json.content }}

parameters.content:
# Sub Workflow Get Content Feedback
## Move to a separate workflow, add the trigger "When Executed by Another Workflow", and connect it to the main workflow "AI Content Creator".

# ‚úÖ AI X Post Creator ‚Äì Quick Start Guide

This workflow automatically generates viral posts for your personal brand on X (Twitter).  
It creates a content idea based on your brand brief, writes a short post, evaluates the post‚Äôs alignment with your tone, checks if it was published before (via Google Sheets), rewrites if needed, sends it for approval on Discord, publishes to X, and updates history logs.

---

## üîß What You Need to Replace

| Placeholder              | Where to Update                                                       |
|--------------------------|------------------------------------------------------------------------|
| **[YOUR NAME]**          | Prompt nodes: `AI Content creator`, `Rewriter`, `OpenAI`              |
| **[YOUR URL]**           | Node: `Notion` (if you use Notion for brief)                          |
| **OpenAi API**           | All `OpenAI` nodes ‚Äì add your actual OpenAI credentials               |
| **Google Sheets **       | All Google Sheets nodes ‚Äì connect your real spreadsheet               |
| **Discord Bot **         | Discord nodes ‚Äì replace with your bot token & correct channel IDs     |
| **X**                    | Twitter node ‚Äì add your real X (Twitter) OAuth2 credentials           |
| **Get Brand Brief**      | Sub-workflow ID ‚Äì must return brand brief as text                     |
| **Get Content Feedback** | Sub-workflow ID ‚Äì must return post evaluation in JSON (score + notes) |

---

## üß© Required Subworkflows

### 1. **Get Brand Brief**  
Create a sub-workflow that returns a brand tone/voice as a single `text` field.

### 2. **Get Content Feedback**  
Create another sub-workflow that takes a post and brand brief, then returns:

```json
{
  "description": "Short evaluation of the post",
  "score": 0.0 ‚Äì 1.0
}

user.name: LukaszB

AI Automation Expert | Web & Mobile App Integrator

I help businesses reduce operational costs, save time, and scale faster with AI-powered solutions.  For business enquiries, send me an email at  kontakt@lumizone.pl

data.details:
The IF node can be used to implement binary conditional logic in your workflow. You can set up one-to-many conditions to evaluate each item of data being inputted into the node. That data will either evaluate to TRUE or FALSE and route out of the node accordingly.

This node has multiple types of conditions: Bool, String, Number, and Date & Time.

data.details: The Execute Workflow node can be used when you want your workflow to treat another workflow as a step in your flow. It allows you to modularize your workflows and have a single source of truth for series of actions you perform often.
